summary: Adds some new cooking recipes using gourds, by request.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/QtD7v94.png[/img][/url][/center]

This simple mod was a request for some food recipes using gourds, and as always, I'm happy to help! The file has been cleaned with TESEDIT and [b][u]requires Hearthfire![/u][/b]

I added a grand total of 10 new meals, some of which that can be made at the cooking pot, and some others through the oven added by Hearthfire. The items added are bread, pie, crostata, dumpling, tart, cookie, chowder, stew, soup, and a stuffed gourd.

These are NOT compatible with "needs" mods, so they will not satisfy your hunger, thirst, or anything else when eaten. [u][b]I am not planning on making compatiblity patches, sorry[/b][/u]. Special thanks to go to Kjell Granlund for the great [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6107/]Addon Textures - Soup[/url], InsanitySorrow for the very useful [url=http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php?/files/file/1203-insanitys-food-stuffs-resource/]Food Stuffs[/url] resource, and the wonderful fellows from the [url=http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php?/files/file/1330-the-tesa-skyrim-resource-kit-project/]The TESA Skyrim Resource Kit Project[/url] at TES Alliance.

To install, extract the contents of your downloaded file to your "Steam/SteamApps/Common/Skyrim/Data" folder. Then activate the mod through your preferred launcher by ticking the checkbox next to the esp. Have fun!
[center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/donate/?mode=straight&id=2543917][img]http://i.imgur.com/V6qmsU9.png[/img][/url][/center][/center][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
author: Jokerine
